course_description: Topics will include: Algebraic numbers and integers, Dedekind domains, discriminants, norm and trace, cyclotomic fields, factorization of ideals in Dedekind domains, decomposition of prime ideals in integral extensions, Hilbert ramification theory, lattice methods, class group, finiteness of class number, DirichletÂ¿s unit theorem, valuations, completions, local fields, and the ramification theory of local fields.
sections: Class Nbr: 1931, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 2:40-3:55p, Instructor: P. Raman, Status: Open
